tasks.coref.i2b2

Class I2B2SectionSegmenter

  • java.lang.Object
    • tasks.coref.i2b2.I2B2SectionSegmenter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SectionSegmenter

    public class I2B2SectionSegmenter
extends java.lang.Object
implements SectionSegmenter
    This class implements a simple method to segment i2b2 discharge summaries.

    The section headers are taken as those lines that end with comma (:) and have at least one token that is capitalized. No subsections are recognized.

    Author:
    Halil Kilicoglu
